- Blood pressure

R emove toxins and metabolites

E ndocrine: EPO and 1,25 dihydroxycholecalciferol

G luconeogenesis.

Concentrates urine to a maximum of about 1200mOsm/l, therefore need to maintain urine output of 0.5ml/kg/h to excrete daily solute load of 10mOsm/kg.
